title: Clarification Learning Model (CLM) Workshop for Advanced Physics Clarification Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physics concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Customized physics education for adult learners, focusing on enhancing data analysis and decision-making skills in the workplace

learning_goals: Learners can construct a clear evidence-based argument structure when analyzing physics problems.
Learners can compare alternative solutions in complex physics situations and make optimal decisions.
Learners can apply advanced clarification skills to write physics reports through project-based assessments.

resources: Zoom Account and Real-Time Collaboration Tools (Miro, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
